'''Freezing Filament''' is an [[aura]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Ice Cages spawn at 12-second intervals.
* Ice Cages also deal {{Color|AoE Cryo DMG}} when they spawn.
* Certain skills can allow characters to dash or teleport out of Ice Cages.

==Damage==
{{Environmental Damage|4|Ice Cages|truedamage=2}}
